name: Prototyper
description:
Automate gamepad and keyboard prototyping.


Get started with a quick overview.


Generate Prototypes

Generate prototypes from just a single top-level frame and components. Select the component instances you'd like to navigate in your prototype and click Generate. Prototyper will create the required frames and interactions for your prototype.


Link Frames

Link top-level frames into a prototype. Useful when you don't have component instances or have already created your prototype screens. Select the frames and click Link. Prototyper will create the required interactions between the frames.


Intelligent Navigation

Prototyper automatically determines the direction of navigation based on how your components and frames are arranged i.e. if components are arranged horizontally, then the direction of navigation is left and right. For best results, arrange your design elements how you'd like to navigate them.


Select from presets like D-Pad, Left or Right Stick, Arrow Keys, WASD, or create your own navigation scheme with custom binds.


Smart Transitions

Apply any Smart Animate transition supported in Figma such as Linear, Ease In, Ease Out, etc. to your prototype.


Swap Variants

Automatically swap component variants in your design to update navigation focus as your move through your prototype.


Supported Devices

Keyboard and Xbox One, PlayStation 4, and Switch Pro controllers.


Open Source

Prototyper is open source and contributions are welcome!
